{{Infobox company | name = Turner Broadcasting System
Latin America | logo = [[Image:Turner logo.svg|center|200px]] | caption = | type = [[Subsidiary]] of [[Time Warner]] | genre = | fate = | predecessor = | successor = | foundation = | founder = | defunct = | location_city = | location_country = | location = | locations = | area_served = | key_people = | industry = [[Entertainment industry|Entertainment]] | products = Entertainment and production | services = Entertainment, production, and distribution | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | aum = | assets = | equity = | owner = [[Time Warner]] | num_employees = | parent = [[Time Warner]] | divisions = | subsid = | homepage = | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System Latin America''' is the company managing the collection of [[cable television|cable]] [[television network|network]]s around [[Latin America]]. Turner Broadcasting System Latin America operates the following brands: [[CNN International]], [[Boomerang (Latin American TV channel)|Boomerang Latin America]], [[TCM]], [[Cartoon Network (Latin America)|Cartoon Network Latin America]], and [[CNN Chile]]. ==News channels== *[[CNN Chile]] *[[CNN en EspaÃ±ol]] *[[CNN International]] *[[HLN (TV network)|HLN]] ==Over the air channels== *[[ChilevisiÃ³n]] ==Entertainment channels== *[[I.Sat]] *[[Space (Latin American TV channel)|Space Latin America]] *[[Hispanic Television]] *[[truTV (Latin America)|truTV Latin America]] *[[Boomerang (Latin American TV channel)|Boomerang Latin America]] *[[Tooncast]] *[[Cartoon Network (Latin America)|Cartoon Network Latin America]] {{Turner Broadcasting System}} {{Turner Broadcasting System Latin America}} {{Time Warner}} ==See also== * [[Turner International Argentina]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System| ]] [[Category:Time Warner]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Latin America| ]]
